amendment.description: Page 48, after line 21, insert the following: \ SEC. 2213. The dollar amounts otherwise provided in this chapter under the heading "IRAQ RELIEF AND RECONSTRUCTION FUND", are each reduced by 50 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the dollar amounts otherwise provided in this chapter under the heading "Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund" by 50 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 553).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Kind.
